title: unnai pOTrinEn
sahitya:
unnai pOTrinEn ennai tETruvAi kanni mA mari annai bAlanE


anupallavi

  cinna nAn unakkenna seiguvEn munnam en manam kETTa nAthanE


caraNam 1    nanri konravanenru kAindiDa anru mALuvEn enrum vADuvEn
konravarkkaruL seyyac-ciluvaiyai ninru vENDum saddam kETTu nAn
    caraNam 2    uruttu mA bhava perutta mUTTaiyAl varuttamAginOr irakki ArungaL
tiruttuvEn maDi iruttuvEnenru irakkamAik-kUvum urukkam kaNDu nAn
    caraNam 3    eNNi un pAdam kaNNIr tOindiDa cennirOmattAl tITTumOr mAdu
unnittEmbiDum uLLattuyar kaNDu mannittOmenra mA mozhi kETTu
    caraNam 4    vanjakan seyyum cancalam nInga tanjamAyenin ceTTai kIzh tangum
nenjam tEriDa anjal enrenai kunju pOleNNi kUvudal kETTu
